name: NBTView
short_description: NBTView is a 'NetBIOS Swiss Army Knife' written in C, and usable under several UNIX-like systems.  NBTView allows you to passively monitor NetBIOS intelligence (users logged in, shares, etc.), run queries against machines, and brute-force share passwords.
